_aChangeLog.text: Tweaked certain stages to be more speedrun friendly
Adjusted lights to not be so bright

_aLatestUpdates._sText: Due to several people asking me to a v2 of this map with the last stage removed, I decided to finally put it out, any server with bhop_verbena should either replace it with this one or add this one as well. This version is way more speedrun friendly and has a lot of tweaks to make the map more enjoyable for everyone. Cheers!

_sText:
Longest map I have made so far and probably the last one.

-20 stages with varied gameplay
-30-35 second very fast paced bonus
-decent aesthetics
-good for both beginners to bhop but also challenging to one shot
-loosely inspired by both fpsmax and aux_a9

Thanks, and have fun
